issue.title: [Ruby] Allow to pass schema when loading table from file
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15206](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15206). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There is ability to do this in C++, but not in Ruby
```java

schema = Arrow::Schema.new(a: :int64, b: :double)
Arrow::Table.load(URI('file:///tmp/example.csv'), format: :csv, schema: schema)
```
This should also work when loading multiple files from folder
